# nx-remote-controller-mod

Remote Controller Mod for NX1/NX500

## Downloads

* v0.8 : [nx-remote-controller-mod-v0.8_nx1_nx500.zip](https://github.com/mewlips/nx-remote-controller-mod/releases/download/v0.8/nx-remote-controller-mod-v0.8_nx1_nx500.zip)
* [NX-KS2](https://www.facebook.com/NXKS2/) : NX-KS2 includes nx-remote-controller-mod. (since v2.56)

## Features

* Remote control camera from web browsers.
  * Mirroring camera screen
  * Remote control functions
  * Multiple connections
* Silent shutter on/off (NX500 only)
* LCD on/off

## How To Install

### Camera (NX1/NX500)

* Prerequisites
  * NX500 with firmware version 1.12 or NX1 with firmware version 1.41
  * [nx-wake-on 1.11](https://github.com/ottokiksmaler/nx500_nx1_modding/tree/master/nx-on-wake) with [nx-patch 5.3](https://github.com/ottokiksmaler/nx500_nx1_modding/tree/master/video-bitrate-mods/nx-patch)

1. Download [nx-remote-controller-mod-v0.8_nx1_nx500.zip](https://github.com/mewlips/nx-remote-controller-mod/releases/download/v0.8/nx-remote-controller-mod-v0.8_nx1_nx500.zip)
1. Unzip the 'nx-remote-controller-mod-v0.8_nx1_nx500.zip' file to root of your SD card.
2. Insert the SD card into your camera and power up the camera.
3. Wait. The installation will be completed soon.

### ~~Android~~

* ~~Install the https://github.com/mewlips/nx-remote-controller-mod/raw/master/NXRemoteController-v0.7.apk~~

## How To Use

* CAUTION: DO NOT CONNECT YOUR CAMERA TO PUBLIC WIFI NETWORK.
  * nx-remote-controller-mod does not provide secure access.

1. Press the 'MOBILE' button.
  * Basic 'MOBILE' function replaced by nx-remote-controller-mod.
  * It will open the WIFI Settings app if the camera is not connected to a Wi-Fi network.
  * If you have a configured Wi-Fi network, the camera will be automatically try to connect to the configured Wi-Fi AP.
  * After the camera is connected on network, then app menu will be launched.
2. Make sure the camera and the PC or Mobile device are on the same Wi-Fi network.
4. Find IP Address of your camera from the app menu.
4. Open 'http://<IP address of camera>' in web browser.

## Known problems

* 'Quick View' is not working on remote screen.
* 'Enlarging a photo' in playback mode is not working on remote screen.
